A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The last Jedi hints that things aren't always as simple as good vs evil. I would have liked them to hit that note harder with more philosophical conversations but I also liked Matrix Reloaded so maybe not everyone would be on board with that. Traditionally Star Wars has been more of a action thrill ride through and through but the action in this ride has more complex motivations which I think brings more depth to the Star Wars universe. This movie still has all the action and humor of a Star Wars movie but sometimes I felt like it was out of an obligation to have action and humor. This might be the darkest of all the films and the bleakest time for the rebels and the humor seems out of place and had the movie spent more time to hone in on the philosophies at play it would have strengthened the action even if there was less of it as a result
